skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Crafted high-performance APIs and worked on optimizing database interactions to drive scalable applications. Developed Streamlining server-side processes and implementing advanced performance enhancements to ensure system reliability and efficiency.

skills.title: Machine Learning
skills.description: Experience in creating and deploying machine learning models and conducting data analysis to derive valuable insights and improve predictive accuracy by leveraging advanced algorithms and techniques to address complex challenges and optimize outcomes.

skills.title: Front End
skills.description: Focused on front-end development using React, creating responsive and intuitive user interfaces that enhance user engagement. My approach emphasizes clean, efficient code and modern design principles to deliver a seamless web experience.

skills.title: Database Management and Distributed Systems
skills.description: Proficient in database management, with a focus on implementing cross-platform integration frameworks. My work ensures seamless backend functionalities and improved database performance for large-scale applications.

portfolio.title: Database indexing Project
portfolio.description: This project utilizes a clustered indexing system to facilitate efficient data retrieval. Designed to optimize storage capacity and minimize memory usage, the system features a modular file handling approach, allowing for flexible data management. The project aims to improve data access speeds and system efficiency.

portfolio.title: TCP Chat Application
portfolio.description: This project is a TCP chat application in C with a server and client. The client connects to the server and sends messages, which are broadcasted to all connected clients. The server handles multiple client connections using a thread pool. The application is scalable and allows for real-time communication.

portfolio.title: Dynamic Range Prediction Model for Evs
portfolio.description: Analysed battery state, temperature, and driving patterns, utilizing regression models and advanced machine learning techniques. Integrated the model into NDS Motors' systems, significantly improving range prediction accuracy and optimizing overall EV fleet management efficiency.
